kpi_info.title: FAILED MAC-D SETUP FOR HSDPA DUE TO RN LAYER
kpi_info.use: The number of failed HS-DSCH Mac-d flow setup failures due to radio network layer cause. UPDATED: When the BTS responds with NBAP: RADIO LINK SETUP FAILURE or NBAP: RADIO LINK RECONFIGURATION FAILURE including error cause in radio network layer category.
